languages.text: "Даже мне очевидно, что предложение вступить в Черное сердце — уловка для отчаявшихся. А ведь я — всего лишь мон-кей!"

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к кабалитам Опустошительной бури] "Назракей предал Маражая, когда они заключили союз — думаете, с вами будет иначе?"

languages.text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"
languages.original_text: "Даже мне очевидно, что предложение вступить в Черное сердце — уловка для отчаявшихся. А ведь я — всего лишь мон-кей!"

traits.locale_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy for the desperate. And I am just a mon-keigh!"
"Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy for the desperate. And I am just a mon-keigh!"
"Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"
"Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"
"Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

languages.text: "Selbst ich kann deutlich sehen, dass das Angebot, dem Schwarzen Herzen beizutreten, eine Intrige ist — ein falscher Rettungsring, der verzweifelten Seelen hingeworfen wird. Und ich bin nur ein Chem-Pan-Sey!"
languages.original_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: "Selbst ich kann deutlich sehen, dass das Angebot, dem Schwarzen Herzen beizutreten, eine Intrige ist — ein falscher Rettungsring, der verzweifelten Seelen hingeworfen wird. Und ich bin nur ein Chem-Pan-Sey!"

languages.text: “就连我都能看得很清楚，纳札骸允许你们加入黑心阴谋团不过是缓兵之计罢了，是向绝望灵魂抛出的虚假救命稻草。而我不过是只猴子！”
languages.original_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: “就连我都能看得很清楚，纳札骸允许你们加入黑心阴谋团不过是缓兵之计罢了，是向绝望灵魂抛出的虚假救命稻草。而我不过是只猴子！”

languages.text: « Je vois bien que l'offre de rejoindre le Cœur Noir n'est qu'un stratagème, une bouée illusoire jetée à des âmes désespérées. Et je ne suis pourtant qu'un mon-keigh ! »
languages.original_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vois bien que l'offre de rejoindre le Cœur Noir n'est qu'un stratagème, une bouée illusoire jetée à des âmes désespérées. Et je ne suis pourtant qu'un mon-keigh ! »

languages.text: «Hasta yo puedo ver que la oferta de uniros al Corazón Negro no es más que una triquiñuela, un falso salvavidas para almas desesperadas. ¡Y solo soy un{mf||a} mon-keigh!».
languages.original_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: «Hasta yo puedo ver que la oferta de uniros al Corazón Negro no es más que una triquiñuela, un falso salvavidas para almas desesperadas. ¡Y solo soy un{mf||a} mon-keigh!».

languages.text: 「たとえ〈黒き心臓〉へ加わるという提案が策略だと—必死にもがく魂に投げられた見せかけの命綱だと、明確にわかっていてもだ。私はただのモン＝ケイだ！」
languages.original_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: 「たとえ〈黒き心臓〉へ加わるという提案が策略だと—必死にもがく魂に投げられた見せかけの命綱だと、明確にわかっていてもだ。私はただのモン＝ケイだ！」

languages.text: "Kara Yürek'e katılma teklifinin bir taktik olduğunu, umutsuz kişilere atılmış sahte bir can simidi olduğunu ben bile açıkça görebiliyorum. Üstelik mon-keigh'im!"
languages.original_text: "Even I can clearly see that the offer to join the Black Heart is a ploy — a false lifeline tossed out to desperate souls. And I am just a mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: "Kara Yürek'e katılma teklifinin bir taktik olduğunu, umutsuz kişilere atılmış sahte bir can simidi olduğunu ben bile açıkça görebiliyorum. Üstelik alt tarafı bir mon-keigh'im!"
